T02D1255:274a-3: sbyin sreg gi cho ga / bcom ldan 'das dpal he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1255:274a-5: bsdu dngos bzhi yis zhabs ldan 'khyud //
T02D1255:274a-6: stong pa bcu drug phyag dang ldan //
T02D1255:274a-8: shi ba rnams la phan don du //
T02D1255:274a-9: rgyud 'dir cho ga mi snang yang //
T02D1255:274a-10: rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rjes 'brangs nas //
T02D1255:274a-11: brtse bas bdag gis bri bar bya //
T02D1255:274a-12: slob dpon phyag rgya lnga dang ldan pas dang por ro khrus byas la /
T02D1255:274a-13: bdud rtsi dang ldan pa'i dris byugs la //
T02D1255:274a-14: ro'i snying gar rang gi lha'i snying po gdags //
T02D1255:274a-15: lha med na snang ba mtha' yas sam //
T02D1255:274a-16: lha mo gtum mo'i snying po gdags //
T02D1255:274a-18: snying gar nye ba'i snying po /
T02D1255:274a-23: rkang pa gnyis la h'a gdags par bya'o //
T02D1255:274a-25: sku gsung byin brlab rigs lnga gdags //
T02D1255:274a-26: rang gi lha'am gzhan yang rung //
T02D1255:274a-27: snying po snying gar gdags par bya //
T02D1255:274a-28: khrus kyis dag bya bdud rtsis byug / ces gsungs so //
T02D1255:274a-29: de nas ro'i snying gar gzungs thag btags la /
T02D1255:274a-30: sgrom du bcug la bdag nyid lha'i dkyil 'khor du bskyed la /
T02D1255:274a-31: gzungs thag nas bzung la bzlas pa byas /
T02D1255:274a-32: skabs su bdud rtsis byug / rtsa ba'i sngags dang ming du spel la til gyi sbyin sreg bya /
T02D1255:274a-33: bzlas pas skyon mchod bstod bya //
T02D1255:274a-36: de nas sa phyogs yid du 'ong bar sbyang ba dang /
T02D1255:274a-37: sa gzung ba dang gtor ma btang ba dang /
T02D1255:274a-38: sa'i lha mo mchod pa dang /
T02D1255:274a-39: bstod pa la sogs pa thams cad dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga las shes par bya'o //
T02D1255:274a-41: sa'i lha mo lhag par gnas nas /
T02D1255:274a-42: lhag par gnas pa'i bar dkyil 'khor gyi chog dang 'dra'o //
T02D1255:274b-0: de nas sbyin sreg lhag par gnas @274b pa dang /
T02D1255:274b-2: ro lhag par gnas pa ni khrus bya /
T02D1255:274b-3: dri zhim po dang ldan pa'i bdud rtsi lngas byugs la /
T02D1255:274b-4: rnam shes dgug pa sngon du 'gro bas rang gis lhar bskyed la /
T02D1255:274b-5: sdig pa bshags pa nas sems bskyed pa'i bar du bya'o //
T02D1255:274b-6: de nas dkyil 'khor gyi lha la mchod pa dang /
T02D1255:274b-11: sta gon du gnas pa'i cho ga'o //
T02D1255:274b-12: de nas dkyil 'khor nam mkha' la bteg la /
T02D1255:274b-14: thig gi cho ga ji lta ba bzhin du thig gdab /
T02D1255:274b-15: tshon gyi cho ga byas la bri bar bya ste /
T02D1255:274b-16: thab kyi dbus su padma brgyad bri //
T02D1255:274b-17: padma'i lte ba la thod pa dang gri gug bri'o //
T02D1255:274b-18: 'dab ma rnams la lha mo rnams kyi mtshan ma bri bar bya'o //
T02D1255:274b-19: kha khyer la rdo rje ra ba bya'o //
T02D1255:274b-20: kha khyer gyi phyi rol du gru chad btod par bya'o //
T02D1255:274b-21: de nas sgo dang rta babs la sogs pa ci rigs par bri bar bya'o //
T02D1255:274b-22: de nas dkyil 'khor bskyed de steng gi lha dang bsres la mchod bstod smon lam gdab po //
T02D1255:274b-23: de nas las thams cad ba'i chu las ku sha'i chun pos shing la gtor la bgegs bsal /
T02D1255:274b-24: shing brtsegs pa ni ci rigs par shes par bya'o //
T02D1255:274b-25: thab kyi nang du stan bting ste ro dang /
T02D1255:274b-26: rnam par shes pa dgug pa sngon du 'gro bas lhar bskyed la /
T02D1255:274b-27: sdig pa bshags pa la sogs pa bya /
T02D1255:274b-29: de nas rlung yab kyis me sbar la /
T02D1255:274b-30: gson cig dgongs shig rigs kyi bu /
T02D1255:274b-31: phung po lnga yi bud shing la //
T02D1255:274b-32: rgyal ba rigs lnga'i me sbar ro //
T02D1255:274b-33: nyon mongs lnga yi bud shing la //
T02D1255:274b-34: mkha' 'gro lnga yi me sbar ro //
T02D1255:274b-35: rnam shes lnga yi bud shing la //
T02D1255:274b-36: ye shes lnga yi me sbar ro //
T02D1255:274b-37: 'byung ba bzhi yi bud shing la //
T02D1255:274b-38: lha mo bzhi yi me sbar ro //
T02D1255:274b-40: sreg blugs gsum me la blugs /
T02D1255:274b-41: me bsangs la me lha ram las bskyed /
T02D1255:274b-42: de nas ye shes kyi me lha spyan drangs te /
T02D1255:274b-43: tshur gshegs tshur spyon me lha'i mchog / drang srong bram ze spyan gsum pa //
T02D1255:274b-44: sreg blugs zhal zas bzhes nas kyang /
T02D1255:275a-3: aom ae hye ma h'a bh'u ta de ba ri shi aa gna ye sv'a h'a /
T02D1255:275a-5: zhes spyan drangs la 'thor 'thung phul te /
T02D1255:275a-6: gnyis su med par bsres la mchod pa brgyad kyis mchod /
T02D1255:275a-7: de nas dgang gzar dang blugs gzar dang ldan pas sbyin sreg bya /
T02D1255:275a-8: dgang blugs gsum me la phul la /
T02D1255:275a-9: de nas rim bzhin du phul te /
T02D1255:275a-10: aom badzra aa gna ya sv'a h'a /
T02D1255:275a-11: zhes bya bas yam shing 'od la dbul lo //
T02D1255:275a-12: aom aa gna ye sv'a h'a /
T02D1255:275a-13: mar khu zhal du dbul lo //
T02D1255:275a-14: aom sarba p'a bam da ha na badzr'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02D1255:275a-15: til dang yungs kar phyag tu'o //
T02D1255:275a-16: aom sarba sam pa de sv'a h'a /
T02D1255:275a-18: aom aa pra ti ha ta badzr'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02D1255:275a-20: aom badzra a'a yu she sv'a h'a /
T02D1255:275a-22: aom ma h'a be g'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02D1255:275a-24: aom ma h'a gha sma ri sv'a h'a /
T02D1255:275a-26: aom badzra bi dz'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02D1255:275a-28: aom ma h'a ba l'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02D1255:275a-29: sran ma ma sha zhal du'o //
T02D1255:275a-30: aom badzra pushta ye sv'a h'a /
T02D1255:275a-32: aom ma h'a sri la aa byi to sv'a h'a /
T02D1255:275a-33: zhes bya bas dz'a ti pha la dang /
T02D1255:275a-34: ta ra ka dang bil pa rnams zhal du dbul lo //
T02D1255:275a-35: zhu ba'i rdzas dang bsreg rdzas lhag ma rnams ni
T02D1255:275a-36: me lha rang gi rig sngags kyis bsreg par bya'o
T02D1255:275a-37: // zhu ba'i rdzas thams cad zhal du'o //
T02D1255:275a-38: au dum w'a ra la sogs pa'i shing thams cad ni aom dang sv'a h'a /
T02D1255:275a-39: zhes bya ba'i bar du rang rang gi ming bcug la bsreg pa'o //
T02D1255:275a-40: de la dri ni thugs kar ro //
T02D1255:275a-46: mchod yon dang 'thor 'thung ni phyag tu dbul bar bya'o //
T02D1255:275a-47: yang na bsreg rdzas thams cad ni spyi'i sngags 'dis dbul lo //
T02D1255:275a-48: aom badzra aa na la ma h'a bh'u ta dzva
T02D1255:275a-49: la sarba bha smim ku ru sarba bi ghn'am h'um
T02D1255:275a-50: phat che ge mo sh'a ntim ku ru sv'a h'a
T02D1255:275a-51: / de nas me lha la mchod pa rnams kyis mchod la bstod de /
T02D1255:275a-52: 'jig rten dbang phyug tshangs dbang mchog gi sras //
T02D1255:275a-53: me lha'i rgyal po ta kki sa dbang bskur ba //
T02D1255:275b-0: ye shes mchog gis nyon mongs thams cad bsreg /'jigs byed me lha nyid la phyag @275b 'tshal bstod //
T02D1255:275b-1: gzi brjid chen po me yi lha //
T02D1255:275b-2: 'dod pa thams cad rab stsol ba //
T02D1255:275b-3: bdag gzhan don brtson sa la bzhugs //
T02D1255:275b-6: de nas phrin las bcol te /
T02D1255:275b-7: drang srong chen po me lha yis //
T02D1255:275b-8: sngon gyi dam bcas mna' bor ba /
T02D1255:275b-9: lha rnams zhal ni me yin te //
T02D1255:275b-10: sbyin sreg de ni me la gnas /
T02D1255:275b-12: me 'bar ba'i rnam par bstim mo //
T02D1255:275b-13: de nas he ru ka zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pas /
T02D1255:275b-14: ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor spyan drangs la /
T02D1255:275b-15: phyi dang nang gis mchod do /
T02D1255:275b-16: de nyid lnga pas bstod de gnyis su med par bsres la /
T02D1255:275b-17: mchod de bstod nas de nas bzlas pa bya'o //
T02D1255:275b-18: de'i rjes la chogs byin gyis brlabs la /
T02D1255:275b-19: lha rnams la yang dbul lo //
T02D1255:275b-20: rnal 'byor pa rnams snying ga'i h'um la bsreg par bya ste /
T02D1255:275b-21: 'di ni nang gi sbyin sreg go //
T02D1255:275b-22: de nas sbyin sreg rnams ji lta ba bzhin du dbul lo //
T02D1255:275b-23: de'i rjes la rang gi lha'i snying po'am rtsa ba'i sngags nyid kyis sdig pa sbyang [?] do //
T02D1255:275b-24: yang na aom a'a: h'um sarba p'a pam da ha
T02D1255:275b-25: na badzra ya che ge mo sh'a ntim ku ru
T02D1255:275b-27: stong ngam khri 'am ji srid nus kyi bar du'o //
T02D1255:275b-28: lhag par gnas par mi byed pa rnams kyis kyang lha'i dkyil 'khor bskyed la /
T02D1255:275b-29: cho ga rnams ni snga ma bzhin du bya'o //
T02D1255:275b-30: gal te gshin po lha ru mi byed na /
T02D1255:275b-32: dgyes pa rdo rje 'di nyid las bza' ba thams
T02D1255:275b-33: cad shar du rdul zhes 'byung bas mgo bo dang
T02D1255:275b-34: // snying dang dbang po rnams ni he ru ka la dbul lo //
T02D1255:275b-35: glad pa ni goo r'i la'o //
T02D1255:275b-36: mcher ba dang mchin pa tsoo r'i ma la'o //
T02D1255:275b-37: dri chu dang lgang pa dang g-yon gyi rtsa ni bet'a l'i la'o //
T02D1255:275b-38: bshang ba dang grod pa dang /
T02D1255:275b-39: gnye ma ni gha sma r'i la'o //
T02D1255:275b-41: khrag dang g-yas kyi rtsa ni sha ba r'i la'o //
T02D1255:275b-42: khu ba dang gzhungs pa dang dbus kyi rtsa ni tsanda l'i la'o //
T02D1255:275b-43: rkang mar dang tshil bu ni dombi n'i la'o //
T02D1255:275b-44: pags pa byang chub kyi yan lag bla rer ro //
T02D1255:275b-45: rus pas ni bden pa bzhi ste /
T02D1255:275b-47: mkhal ma rnams ni spyan gzigs dang rgyun du dbul bar bya'o //
T02D1255:276a-4: nang grol dang dbang po rnams ni me tog tu'o //
T02D1255:276a-5: glad pa dang gzhungs pa ni byug par ro //
T02D1255:276a-6: tshil chen ni snang bar ro //
T02D1255:276a-8: pags pa ni bla rer ro//
T02D1255:276a-9: rkang brgyad ni gling bu la sogs pa rol mor ro //
T02D1255:276a-10: rus pa rnams ni phyag rgya lngar ro //
T02D1255:276a-11: skra dang spu la sogs pa ni gzhal yas khang gi rgyan du dbul lo //
T02D1255:276a-12: de nas thams cad rtsa ba'i sngags sam /
T02D1255:276a-13: rang gi sngags kyis byin gyis brlabs la dbul bar bya'o //
T02D1255:276a-15: mchod pa'i gzugs sam rnam dag ni //
T02D1255:276a-16: rang rang ngo bor dbul bar bya'o //
T02D1255:276a-17: zhes gsungs so de nas phyi nang gi mchod pas mchod //
T02D1255:276a-18: bstod pa rnams kyis bstod la lam sbyang ste //
T02D1255:276a-19: tshogs lam smig rgyu lta bu ste //
T02D1255:276a-20: gnyis pa du ba lta bu ste //
T02D1255:276a-21: gsum pa glog tu khyod kyis mthong //
T02D1255:276a-22: bzhi pa mar me lta bu ste //
T02D1255:276a-23: lnga pa thams cad stong pa ni //
T02D1255:276a-24: sangs rgyas sa ni 'di nyid do //
T02D1255:276a-25: srid pa bar do 'di nyid du //
T02D1255:276a-26: khyod kyis lam lnga mthar phyin shog /
T02D1255:276a-29: khyod kyis lam lnga mthar phyin pas //
T02D1255:276a-30: phung po lnga nyid sangs rgyas lnga //
T02D1255:276a-31: nyon mongs lnga ni mkha' 'gro lnga //
T02D1255:276a-32: rnam shes brgyad ni ye shes bzhi //
T02D1255:276a-33: 'byung ba bzhi ni lha mo bzhi //
T02D1255:276a-34: srid pa'i 'khor lo rgyun bcad nas //
T02D1255:276a-35: chos kyi 'khor lo yongs bskor te //
T02D1255:276a-36: 'khor ba bya ba'i ming yang med //
T02D1255:276a-38: smon lam ni bdag cag gis dgyes pa rdo rje 'khor dang bcas pa la /
T02D1255:276a-40: sbyin sreg rnams kyis mchod pas /
T02D1255:276a-41: bdag dang yon bdag dang tshe 'das pa dang sems can thams cad sgrib pa rnam pa gnyis byang /
T02D1255:276a-43: 'di nyid du bla na med pa'i byang chub chen
T02D1255:276a-44: po thob par gyur cig ces smon lam btab la
T02D1255:276a-45: / 'dod pa'i don la gsol ba gdab bo //
T02D1255:276a-46: dpal dgyes pa rdo rje 'khor dang bcas pa la phrin las su gsol ba ni bdag cag dang /
T02D1255:276a-47: yon gyi bdag po rnams la nad kyi rigs su gyur pa rlung dang /
T02D1255:276b-0: @276b 'dus pa las gyur pa thams cad zhi bar
T02D1255:276b-1: mdzod cig / gdon gyi rigs su gyur pa gdon
T02D1255:276b-2: stong phrag brgyad cu las thar bar mdzod cig /'phral
T02D1255:276b-3: gyi rkyen las gyur pa thams cad zhi bar mdzad
T02D1255:276b-4: du gsol // de nas bzod par gsol to //
T02D1255:276b-5: bdag dus snyigs ma'i sems can du gyur pas yo byad ma tshogs pa dang /
T02D1255:276b-6: bdag las dang po par gyur pas sems la dbang ma thob ste /
T02D1255:276b-7: bying ba dang rgod pa'i dbang gis mi gsal ba dang /
T02D1255:276b-8: cho ga nyams shing lhag chad du gyur pa thams cad bzod pa chen por mdzad du gsol //
T02D1255:276b-9: de nas gshegs su gsol lo //
T02D1255:276b-10: de nas me lha la ci 'byor ba'i mchod pa dang /
T02D1255:276b-11: bsreg rdzas lhag ma rnams phul te /
T02D1255:276b-12: 'jig rten dbang phyug zhes bya ba la sogs pas bstod la /
T02D1255:276b-13: 'dod pa'i don la gsol ba gdab //
T02D1255:276b-14: drang srong chen po khyod la bdag gis ci 'byor ba'i mchod pa dang /
T02D1255:276b-15: sbyin sreg rnams kyis mchod pas bdag cag gi mi
T02D1255:276b-16: mthun pa'i phyogs nad kyi rigs su gyur pa dang
T02D1255:276b-18: 'phral gyi rkyen thams cad zhi bar mdzad du gsol lo //
T02D1255:276b-21: dpal dang 'byor pa dang gzi brjid rnams ni zla
T02D1255:276b-22: ba yar gyi ngo bzhin 'phel bar mdzad du gsol
T02D1255:276b-24: bdag gis yo byad ma 'byor pa dang cho ga
T02D1255:276b-25: nyams shing 'khrul ba ci mchis pa rnams ni bzod
T02D1255:276b-26: pa chen po mdzad du gsol lo zhes brjod la
T02D1255:276b-28: dkyil 'khor phyags la chu bo chen por dor bar bya'o //
T02D1255:276b-29: de nas rus ba bsdus nas sa tsha gdab par bya'o //
T02D1255:276b-30: de nas rus pa'am gos sam ming byang la /
T02D1255:276b-31: sa tsha gdab cing dbang bskur bya /
T02D1255:276b-32: zhes 'byung bas sa tsha'i cho ga ji lta ba
T02D1255:276b-33: bzhin btab pa la dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur te
T02D1255:276b-34: / rnam par shes pa dgug pa sngon du 'gro bas /
T02D1255:276b-35: rang gi lhar byas la sdig pa bshags pa la sogs pa byas te /
T02D1255:276b-36: rig pa'i dbang lnga brtul zhugs dang drug bskur ro //
T02D1255:276b-37: sdom pa 'bogs par mi bya ste /
T02D1255:276b-38: shes pa kun du zin kyang dbang po med pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1255:277a-2: byas pa'i dge ba gang bsags pa //
T02D1255:277a-3: des ni 'jig rten thams cad kyis //
T02D1255:277a-4: dri med ye shes thob bar shog / ro sreg
T02D1255:277a-5: pa'i cho ga slob dpon nag pos mdzad pa rdzogs
T02D1255:277a-7: / rgya gar gyi mkhan po nag po dang /
